original_text: “Take this Book of the Law and put it by the side of the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God, that it may be there for a witness against you.
korean_text: 이 율법책을 가져다가 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤 곁에 두어 너희에게 증거가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: Take this Book of the Law
and put it by the side of the ark of the covenant
that it may be there for a witness against you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너희를 반대하는 증거가 되게 하려고
